_inspectorSnowReport.Report:
Good Morning Skiers and Riders! This is Laurie with your 5 am snow report for Monday, December 22nd. Remember the easiest way to get up to date information is on the Ikon Pass app or website.  
Our Mid mountain base is 15 inches, the temperature is 39 degrees, the winds are 11 miles per hour from the SSW, with partly cloudy skies.  
The Summit base is 20 inches, the temperature is 31 degrees, the winds are 20 miles per hour from the SSE, with partly cloudy skies. 
The base temperature is 32 degrees.  
We will be skiing and riding on 15 lifts, 37 runs, and 253 acres on MM/PP snow.  
Stay in the know with the Ikon Pass App. Find it in the app store on your mobile device and get lift and trail statuses, conditions updates, and more.  
If you are thinking of exploring outside the ski area boundaries, and dont know exactly where you are going, dont go.  
Ski and Ride with Care and we will see you on the mountain!
